purpose: The email announces a call for papers for a special issue on Agentic Artificial Intelligence (AI) in the ACM Transactions on Software Engineering and Methodology (TOSEM) scheduled for 2026. It highlights the significant impact of AI on various branches of Software Engineering (SE) and invites original research articles on automation due to agentic AI, its integration into software workflows, and its effects on team dynamics. The email outlines specific categories for submissions and provides important deadlines for the submission process, including the paper submission deadline and review timelines. Queries regarding the special issue can be directed to the listed editors.
